game.name: Stock Market Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Start from nothing and climb your way to the top. Work everyday jobs, trade stocks and crypto, and explore a city full of side activities. Will you play it safe, or risk it all to become the ultimate investor?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Start from nothing and climb your way to the top. Work everyday jobs, trade stocks and crypto, and explore a city full of side activities. Will you play it safe, or risk it all to become the ultimate investor?
